# upzonetrigger

The goal of [`upzonetrigger`](https://github.com/tiernanmartin/upzonetrigger) is to help policy makers in Washington State create a data-driven policy requiring _some_ cities to upzone land around high-frequency transit.

## Installation

You can install the released version of [`upzonetrigger`](https://github.com/tiernanmartin/upzonetrigger) from its Github [repository](https://github.com/tiernanmartin/upzonetrigger) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("upzonetrigger")
```
